The developers should make a gource video (it would be fun to watch, and even better after the 1.1 release), for those who don't know what it is, let me explain:

It makes a video of your git folder and how different people worked on different files and it is beautiful.  

This is the gource video from minecraft:

, so please ksp make a video, it doesn't take much time :-P
